meta.property: One Hundred Sixteenth Congress of the United States of America

To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 1750 McCulloch Boulevard North in Lake Havasu City, Arizona, as the “Lake Havasu City Combat Veterans Memorial Post Office Building”.

main.name: HR3314

content.p: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 1750 McCulloch Boulevard North in Lake Havasu City, Arizona, as the “Lake Havasu City Combat Veterans Memorial Post Office Building”.

main.enactingFormula: Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the United States of America in Congress assembled,

section.heading: Lake Havasu City Combat Veterans Memorial Post Office Building.

subsection.heading: Designation.—
subsection.content: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 1750 McCulloch Boulevard North in Lake Havasu City, Arizona, shall be known and designated as the “Lake Havasu City Combat Veterans Memorial Post Office Building”.

subsection.heading: References.—
subsection.content: Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the “Lake Havasu City Combat Veterans Memorial Post Office Building”.

signature.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
